translation.en: -♪ Chico ♪ -♪ Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ･ボンボン～

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ チコ チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: ♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ･ボンボン　　チコ チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ チコ チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: ♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ･ボンボン　　チコ チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪ ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
translation.ja: チコ･ボンボンと　　すてきなどうぐベルト

translation.en: ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
translation.ja: おさるとどうぐベルト

translation.en: -I saw a m-m-monkey! -[all] Tool belt!
translation.ja: おさるのチコと… どうぐベルト！

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ チコ チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: ♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ･ボンボン　　チコ チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪ ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.ja: チコ チコ チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: Monkey with a tool belt!
translation.ja: チコ･ボンボンとすてきなどうぐベルト

translation.en: [Rainbow] "Chico Bon Bon and the Ice Cream Monster!"
translation.ja: アイスクリームモンスター

translation.en: I scream, you scream, we all scream for…
translation.ja: アイスクリーム みんなで さけぶと…

translation.en: Ice cream?
translation.ja: アイス？

translation.en: Chico, I love that you've re-engineered my Fridgey Boo Boo
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)ちゃんを改造(かいぞう)してくれてうれしいわ

translation.en: to make ice cream, but it keeps coming out melty.
translation.ja: アイスができるようにねでも とけて出(で)てくるの…

translation.en: Oh, I think I see the problem, Mrs. Coleslaw.
translation.ja: なるほど分(わ)かったぞ

translation.en: There must be something wrong with Fridgey's insulation.
translation.ja: 断熱材(だんねつざい)に問題(もんだい)があるみたい

translation.en: Oh dear! His what, now?
translation.ja: あらまあ今度(こんど)は何(なん)ですって？

translation.en: Insulation.
translation.ja: 断熱材(だんねつざい)よ

translation.en: Check it out. Fridgey Boo Boo's got a freezing machine to make ice cream,
translation.ja: アイスを作(つく)る冷凍機(れいとうき)にある発砲材(はっぽうざい)が―

translation.en: and this foam material is insulation. It's what keeps the ice cream cold once it's made.
translation.ja: 熱(ねつ)をさえぎることでアイスを冷(つめ)たく保(たも)っているの

translation.en: The foam insulation makes it hard for heat to get in.
translation.ja: 断熱材(だんねつざい)で熱(ねつ)が入(はい)らない

translation.en: That's why Fridgey can keep things cold.
translation.ja: だから中身(なかみ)が冷(ひ)えてる

translation.en: Looks like Fridgey Boo Boo doesn't have enough insulation. That's why the ice cream comes out melty.
translation.ja: この子(こ)の断熱材(だんねつざい)が少(すく)ないからアイスがとける

translation.en: Oh no! What do we do, Chico?
translation.ja: どうしたらいいの　チコ？

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll just add some more foam for better insulation.
translation.ja: 大(だい)じょう夫(ぶ)断熱材(だんねつざい)を足(た)せばいいんだ

translation.en: There. Now you've got the perfect ice cream making machine.
translation.ja: これで完(かん)ぺきなアイスを作(つく)れるはずさ

translation.en: Go on, give it a try.
translation.ja: 試(ため)してみて

translation.en: Well, all right.
translation.ja: やってみるわね

translation.en: Nice and cold, just the way I like it.
translation.ja: おいしくて冷(つめ)たい理想的(りそうてき)だわ

translation.en: Insulation!
translation.ja: 断熱(だんねつ)だ！

translation.en: Thank you, Chico.
translation.ja: ありがとう チコ

translation.en: And thank you, Fridgey Boo Boo.
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)ちゃんも いい子(こ)ね

translation.en: The banana phone!
translation.ja: バナナフォン

translation.en: Chico Bon Bon! You got a problem? We can solve 'em!
translation.ja: トラブル発生(はっせい)？ぼくたちに任(まか)せて！

translation.en: [in Italian accent] Freddy and Betty Lemuretti here.
translation.ja: こちらはフレディとベティ

translation.en: Has this ever happened to you?
translation.ja: こんな経験(けいけん)はあるかしら？

translation.en: You're enjoying a delicious ice cream treat
translation.ja: アイスを食(た)べていたら

translation.en: when a giant monster grabs it right out of your hand?
translation.ja: デカいモンスターにうばわれた

translation.en: No, that's never happened to us.
translation.ja: そんな経験(けいけん)はないよ

translation.en: Actually, it has happened to us.
translation.ja: いや たった今(いま) 経験(けいけん)した

translation.en: [both] Us too!
translation.ja: こっちも！

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: もっとアイスを出(だ)せ！

translation.en: That monster ate all of our ice cream! And she's still hungry!
translation.ja: あのモンスターはアイスをひとりじめしてる

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: もっと食(た)べたい！

translation.en: Say no more. We're on our way!
translation.ja: 分(わ)かった　今(いま)行(い)くよ

translation.en: Fix-It Force, we need to feed that monster fast,
translation.ja: モンスターをおなか一杯(いっぱい)にしよう

translation.en: or she'll destroy Blunderburg looking for more ice cream.
translation.ja: でないと町(まち)がこわされる

translation.en: It's time to bring the ice cold awesome!
translation.ja: 冷(つめ)たいアイスを持(も)って参上(さんじょう)だ

translation.en: [kids] Chico Bon Bon!
translation.ja: チコ･ボンボン

translation.en: Rainbow Thunder!
translation.ja: レインボー･サンダー

translation.en: Clark!
translation.ja: クラーク

translation.en: Tiny!
translation.ja: タイニー

translation.en: I'm Neil Ostrich here on the scene.
translation.ja: ニールが お伝(つた)えします

translation.en: Literally, on the scene.
translation.ja: まさに現場(げんば)では

translation.en: There's a monster on the loose in Blunderburg
translation.ja: モンスターが大暴(おおあば)れ

translation.en: and it's hungry for one thing: ice cream!
translation.ja: 目的(もくてき)は ただ１つアイスクリームです

translation.en: I don't-- Whoa!
translation.ja: わたしは…

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: もっとアイスをくれ！

translation.en: Cones, sundaes, novelty treats…
translation.ja: コーンでもサンデーでも…

translation.en: No form of ice cream is safe!
translation.ja: アイスなら うばわれる

translation.en: Who can save the city from that ice-cream-craving creature?
translation.ja: このモンスターから町(まち)を守(まも)れるのはだれ？

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: もっとアイスを食(く)わせろ

translation.en: I'm Chico Bon Bon, monkey with a tool belt!
translation.ja: ぼくはチコ自(じ)まんは どうぐベルト

translation.en: And we're the Fix-It Force!
translation.ja: おたすけチームよ

translation.en: And that's one big monster!
translation.ja: なんて大(おお)きなモンスター！

translation.en: Which means we need a monster-sized serving of ice cream to fill her tummy,
translation.ja: つまりモンスターサイズのアイスで―

translation.en: so she'll never come after our ice cream again.
translation.ja: 満腹(まんぷく)にすればいいんだ

translation.en: But Betty and I will never be able to make enough!
translation.ja: そんな大(おお)きなアイス作(つく)れない

translation.en: Then what we need is all the ice cream left in Blunderburg.
translation.ja: 町(まち)じゅうのアイスを集(あつ)めればいい

translation.en: Operation Ice Cream begins now!
translation.ja: アイス作戦(さくせん) スタート！

translation.en: Our tastiest mission yet!
translation.ja: おいしそうだね

translation.en: [Neil] As the Ice Cream Monster continues her rampage,
translation.ja: モンスターが暴(あば)れる中(なか)―

translation.en: Mayor Murphy has declared a level-five ice cream emergency!
translation.ja: 市長(しちょう)はレベル５の緊急(きんきゅう)アイス宣言(せんげん)を出(だ)しました

translation.en: Citizens of Blunderburg, the Fix-It Force needs your ice cream!
translation.ja: みなさん　おたすけチームにアイスを渡(わた)してください

translation.en: Thanks, Mayor!
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: -All right! -So much ice cream!
translation.ja: やった 大量(たいりょう)だわ

translation.en: [Clark] Our bowl is full!
translation.ja: 満杯(まんぱい)だよ

translation.en: Then it's time to feed the monster!
translation.ja: モンスターにあげよう

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: もっとアイスを出(だ)せ！

translation.en: -[Chico] Quick! Release the ice cream! -Uh, Chico, I think we're too late.
translation.ja: 急(いそ)いでアイスを！ 遅(おそ)すぎたかも…

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.ja: なんで？

translation.en: The ice cream's all melted!
translation.ja: アイスがとけちゃった

translation.en: No melty ice cream!
translation.ja: とけたアイスは いらない

translation.en: Okay, so she really doesn't like melty ice cream.
translation.ja: とけたアイスは大嫌(だいきら)いみたいだね

translation.en: We've gotta figure out a way to keep the ice cream cold long enough to feed that monster.
translation.ja: 冷(つめ)たいままで届(とど)ける方法(ほうほう)を考(かんが)えるしかない

translation.en: Yeah, like with a freezer!
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)ごととかね

translation.en: But it would need to be a monster-sized freezer.
translation.ja: モンスターサイズの冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)がいる

translation.en: A monster-sized freezer!
translation.ja: モンスターサイズ？

translation.en: That's a great idea, Clark!
translation.ja: いい考(かんが)えだね！

translation.en: Rainbow, set a course to Mrs. Coleslaw's house.
translation.ja: コールスローさんちに行こう

translation.en: Chico, are you sure you wanna do this?
translation.ja: チコ　本気(ほんき)なのかい？

translation.en: Remember what happened the last time Fridgey Boo Boo transformed into Fridgebot?
translation.ja: 前(まえ)に暴走(ぼうそう)ロボットに改造(かいぞう)したらどうなった？

translation.en: Oh, I remember!
translation.ja: そうよ　覚(おぼ)えてるわ

translation.en: He went through town shooting ice cubes at everything!
translation.ja: 町(まち)じゅうで氷(こおり)を発射(はっしゃ)したのよ

translation.en: I know, but he's our only hope.
translation.ja: そうだけど これしかない

translation.en: Now presenting…
translation.ja: というわけで…

translation.en: [Chico] Fridgebot 2.0, the perfect ice cream delivery machine.
translation.ja: 暴走(ぼうそう)ロボット2.0完(かん)ぺきなアイス配達(はいたつ)ロボ

translation.en: Now with ice cream blasting power!
translation.ja: アイスクリーム･ブラストパワー！

translation.en: Too melty!
translation.ja: ドロドロよ

translation.en: Oh! It just needs a little more insulation to keep all that ice cream cold.
translation.ja: もっと断熱材(だんねつざい)を足(た)せばいいんだよ

translation.en: And… we're good to go!
translation.ja: たっぷりと！ これでいい

translation.en: I even loaded up some new ice cream jokes.
translation.ja: ジョーク機能(きのう)も搭載(とうさい)した

translation.en: Why do ice cream cones carry umbrellas?
translation.ja: アイスのコーンは傘(かさ)を持(も)ってる

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: Because there's always a chance of sprinkles!
translation.ja: スプリンクルが降(ふ)るから

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: アイスをよこせ！

translation.en: The Ice Cream Monster, she's coming this way!
translation.ja: モンスターが来(く)るぞ

translation.en: We've gotta feed her, fast!
translation.ja: 早(はや)く あげよう

translation.en: Let's go, Fridgebot!
translation.ja: さあ 行(い)くぞ

translation.en: Bye-bye, Fridgey! Have fun, now.
translation.ja: バイバイ 冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)ちゃん楽(たの)しんでね

translation.en: I'm reporting live from downtown Blunderburg,
translation.ja: 繁華街(はんかがい)から生中継(なまちゅうけい)です

translation.en: where the hungry Ice Cream Monster is still searching for ice cr-- Whoa!
translation.ja: モンスターがアイスクリームを探(さが)して…

translation.en: Nom? Ice cream?
translation.ja: アイスクリーム？

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: アイスを食(た)べさせろ

translation.en: [Chico] Hey, Ice Cream Monster!
translation.ja: アイスのモンスター！

translation.en: Okay, Fridgebot, do your thing! Ice cream blasters, go!
translation.ja: 得意(とくい)のブラスターをお見(み)舞(ま)いしろ 撃(う)て！

translation.en: Activate booster cannons!
translation.ja: ブースター･キャノン！

translation.en: How's about a little strawberry and some chocolate chip!
translation.ja: イチゴとチョコチップはどうだ？

translation.en: Ooh! Don't forget peanut butter!
translation.ja: ピーナツバターも

translation.en: And rainbow sprinkles!
translation.ja: スプリンクルもね

translation.en: [gasps] I think it's working!
translation.ja: 満腹(まんぷく)かな？

translation.en: More ice cream!
translation.ja: アイスをもっと食(く)わせろ！

translation.en: [Clark] What? She still wants more?
translation.ja: ウソだろ？　もっとだって

translation.en: I don't think she'll stop until she's totally full,
translation.ja: 完全(かんぜん)に満腹(まんぷく)になるまで止(と)まらない

translation.en: and even Fridgebot can't feed her fast enough!
translation.ja: ロボットでも間(ま)に合(あ)わない

translation.en: You're right, Rainbow.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: We need to make her a super-sized bowl of ice cream so she can really chow down.
translation.ja: 超(ちょう)デカいアイスで満腹(まんぷく)にしないとダメだ

translation.en: But where are we gonna find a bowl big enough to serve a giant monster?
translation.ja: そんなにデカいアイスを入(い)れる器(うつわ)はあるの？

translation.en: [Chico] Giant bowl… Giant bowl…
translation.ja: デカい器(うつわ)　デカい器(うつわ)…

translation.en: [gasps] The Blunderdome.
translation.ja: ブレンダードーム

translation.en: It's just the right size and shape
translation.ja: サイズも形(かたち)もピッタリ

translation.en: for the biggest, baddest bowl of ice cream ever!
translation.ja: サイコーにデカいアイスを入れる

translation.en: Fridgebot, fill it up!
translation.ja: あそこに発射(はっしゃ)だ

translation.en: Now, mint!
translation.ja: ミント！

translation.en: Now, vanilla!
translation.ja: バニラ

translation.en: Now, blunderberry!
translation.ja: ブレンダーベリー

translation.en: And finally… the cherry on top.
translation.ja: そして最後(さいご)はサクランボをのせる

translation.en: Whoa-ho-ho! That ought to be enough for the monster!
translation.ja: これで満腹(まんぷく)になる

translation.en: Uh… guys! The ice cream is already melting! We gotta keep it cold!
translation.ja: とけ始(はじ)めてるよ冷(ひ)やさないと！

translation.en: We spent all this time collecting the ice cream and now it's going to melt!
translation.ja: せっかく集(あつ)めたのにとけちゃう

translation.en: We have to figure out how to keep the Blunderdome cold enough to keep it from melting. What if it doesn't work?
translation.ja: なんとかドームを冷(ひ)やしてとけないようにしよう

translation.en: Chico? Maybe now's a good time for a banana break.
translation.ja: チコ　バナナタイムにしたらどう？

translation.en: [Chico] Okay, the monster wants ice cream, -but we can't keep the ice cream cold. -[buzzing]
translation.ja: アイスはモンスターにあげる前(まえ)にとける

translation.en: Fridgey Boo Boo can only keep it cold when it's inside him. -Outside, it melts! -[buzzing]
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)だと中(なか)は冷(ひ)やせるけど外(そと)はムリ

translation.en: Because there's no insulation.
translation.ja: 断熱材(だんねつざい)がないから

translation.en: Insulation!
translation.ja: 断熱(だんねつ)か！

translation.en: Blazing bananas, that's it! We need insulation.
translation.ja: バナナでひらめき！ 断熱材(だんねつざい)があればいい

translation.en: Oh yeah!
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: If we insulate the entire Blunderdome, we can keep the ice cream cold.
translation.ja: ドーム全体(ぜんたい)を覆(おお)えばアイスは とけない

translation.en: Great idea!
translation.ja: いいアイデア

translation.en: Rainbow, activate foam cannon and prepare to insulate.
translation.ja: レインボー発泡材(はっぽうざい)キャノンで断熱(だんねつ)を！

translation.en: -Hang on to your whiskers! -[engine revs]
translation.ja: つかまってて

translation.en: Folks, I can't believe what I'm seeing.
translation.ja: 信(しん)じられません！

translation.en: The Fix-It Force are insulating the Blunderdome with foam!
translation.ja: チームがドームを発砲材(はっぽうざい)で覆(おお)ってる

translation.en: -We did it! -Yeah!
translation.ja: やったね

translation.en: [Chico] The ice cream isn't melting!
translation.ja: とけてないぞ

translation.en: It's an insulation sensation!
translation.ja: 断熱効果(だんねつこうか)で大喜(おおよろ)びだね

translation.en: -[Clark and Thunder] Whoa! -She is hungry!
translation.ja: おなかがすいてる

translation.en: All full!
translation.ja: おなか一杯(いっぱい)だわ

translation.en: -[all cheering] -She's full!
translation.ja: やった 満足(まんぞく)してる

translation.en: Bye-bye!
translation.ja: バイバイ！

translation.en: We saved the city, Fridgebot.
translation.ja: 町(まち)を救(すく)えたぜ ロボ

translation.en: Now there's only one thing left to do…
translation.ja: やり残(のこ)しは１つだけ

translation.en: [Chico] Ice cream! Come get your ice cream.
translation.ja: アイスだよ　アイスをどうぞ

translation.en: Mmm! Thanks for the ice cream, Chico.
translation.ja: ごちそうさま　チコ

translation.en: The Ice Cream Monster's gone for good! Thank you, Chico.
translation.ja: モンスターは消(き)えたわチコのおかげよ

translation.en: We couldn't have done it without Fridgey Boo Boo here.
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)ちゃんのおかげ

translation.en: Oh! I love you, Fridgey Boo Boo!
translation.ja: 愛(いと)しい冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)ちゃん

translation.en: What is ice cream's favorite day of the week?
translation.ja: アイスが好(す)きな曜日(ようび)は？

translation.en: [all] What is it?
translation.ja: 何曜日(なんようび)？

translation.en: Sunday!
translation.ja: 日曜日(サンデー)

translation.en: Oh, Fridgey Boo Boo!
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ)ちゃんったら！
